channel.title: [pi]making an item bonus based upon a players stat?
channel.description:
is it possible in pi to make it so that when you equip a certain weapon, the strength bonus of that weapon is dependent upon that players strength level?
for example if a player wielded a bronze scimitar and had a strength level of 1, the scim would have a +1 strength bonus, and if a player with 99 strength wielded it, it would have a +99 strength bonus.
is this possible? and if so then how could i do this?
